game.name: Nightwalker 2
game.shortDescription: Nightwalker 2 is a horror adventure game that focuses on story and exploration. While trying to uncover the mysteries of the lost village, Nightwalker needs to do more than before to survive.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Nightwalker 2 is a horror adventure game that focuses on story and exploration. While trying to uncover the mysteries of the lost village, Nightwalker needs to do more than before to survive.

reviewHighlights.text: very creative use of perspective in this game. fun short riddles and puzzles that arent too complicated. overall leisurely and atmospheric.
You show up in this world and sort of survive. You're scared and you're afraid. And there's a lot to be afraid of here, uh, and what it is, you'll see...
